title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
o listen [DRAGONBORN] Heed the man's words, child. His form is highly efficient. Leave

After you pull him aside, you will realize that he too was infected and you can eventually invite him to your party, starting the Companion Quest.

Hunt down Karlach.

We recruited Wyll, a monster hunter known as the Blade of Frontiers. He is on a mission to kill Karlach, a powerful devil who is a danger to the entire Sword Coast.
